concept.title: Subscription Add-Ons
concept.abstract:
Includes Grace Period and Advance Calendar Period functionality. Grace Period defines a period of time to receive benefits past the subscriptions paid through date. Advance Calendar Period define the period in which a subscriber can purchase a subscription for the following fiscal year while receiving the remainder of the current year free of charge.
This is an unmanaged package. This means that you will not be able to update this package if a new version is available. You will need to uninstall the old version and install the new version. When uninstalling packages you will be at risk of losing data that was defined with the previous versionâ€™s package. As this is a free, unmanaged package, Fonteva does not offer support for Subscription Add-Ons.
Installation
After installing the Subscription Add-Ons package, complete the following steps to complete installation:
Run the install scripts: Navigate to your name > Developer Console > Debug > Open Execute Anonymous Window
Paste new Sub_PackageScripts.Install().run(); in the window and click Execute.
Add new fields to page layouts:
Subscription Plan object: Grace Period, Advance Calendar Period
Subscription object: Grace Period End Date
